title: Achievement icons set (office escape / bosses / mars / sun / no damage / collector)

prompt.positive: Set of achievement icons in sci-fi comic style, bold silhouette, neon accents, clean edges, transparent background. Themes: office desk/escape, alien face, boss skull, mars pickaxe, sun flame, shield no-damage, magnet collector. No text.
prompt.negative: photo, watermark, text, cluttered background, low contrast
